name: Names & Faces
headline: Technology to create fast, visual indexes of people and organizations.
description: Build a visual index of everyone in your organization that's instantly accessible, fully customizable, and always connected to your data. Help everyone from the CEO to the new joiner get to know who's who, get context for where people fit in and get in touch when they need to.

founders.name: Paul Galatis, Founder
founders.description:
I'm the founder and CEO of Names & Faces. We're grateful to have Accel, Y Combinator, Slack Fund, and Elad Gill backing us on our mission to build technology that helps people thrive in the groups that matter to them.

Highlights of my past life include launching the 20-Over Cricket format in South Africa, winning a South African Music Award, attending Northwestern University as a Mandela Washington Fellow, and building Yuppiechef.com, a Tiger Global backed e-commerce company in South Africa.

# Create a directory and org chart of your team in minutes.
[Get started](http://www.namesandfaces.com/</get-started>)[Book a demo](http://www.namesandfaces.com/<https:/calendly.com/sales-1980/names-faces-overview?month=2021-11>)
Book a call | Explore demo | Create an account.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/618e2b3f0ea8214d83c4ebfe_data.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/619f8a5fcb87928404d4e0f1_Logos.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/619f8d15e8de326980ff149c_Logos-Side.png)

Trusted by organizations of all sizes
![m & c saatchi logo names and faces
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/617bda28bb51c983d8e0e9ed_M%26C.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/61936f9437967907c7c62d25_Uinta.png)![embark logo names and faces](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/617bda0ad124684e596a2f54_Embark.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/617bda7df072f313feca2aba_Rock%20%26%20Roll.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/617bda51cd3b6dd94f31ad78_Bondi.png)![Ironclad logo names and faces
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/617bdab8a7afb603c97f98e5_Ironclad.svg)
Always accurate
## Sync your data or start from scratch
Names & Faces syncs with your HRIS system or a spreadsheet so your employee directory and org chart are always up to date and require no additional management.
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/6184fa851f99a176008d8fa0_Printed%20Org%20Chart%20Mockup%204.png)
Always available
## Instant org charts
Let your team view and export 100% accurate org charts whenever they need to. No more Powerpoint. No more Visio. [Learn more](http://www.namesandfaces.com/</orgchart>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/616eebc27888b7d03b09d8ea_icon-check-technology-template.svg)
Scenario planning
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/616eebc27888b7d03b09d8ea_icon-check-technology-template.svg)
Customizable data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/616eebc27888b7d03b09d8ea_icon-check-technology-template.svg)
Export in multiple formats
Web and mobile
## See your team in a whole new way
We've been recognizing faces for 200,000 years. Use those skills and get to know and contact your team faster than ever before.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/616eebc27888b7d03b09d8ea_icon-check-technology-template.svg)
Photo focused profiles
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/616eebc27888b7d03b09d8ea_icon-check-technology-template.svg)
Get in touch at the tap of a button
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/616eebc27888b7d03b09d8ea_icon-check-technology-template.svg)
Web and Mobile app (iOS & Android)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/6185031867f78e0ca16347f9_Phone.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/618504c2a882a7afaa479994_Phone%20\(1\).png)
Fully customizable
## Make it your own
Use your data to create categories and filters that make sense to you, so your people can easily get to know one another and find who they’re looking for. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/616eebc27888b7d03b09d8ea_icon-check-technology-template.svg)
Customize branding
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/616eebc27888b7d03b09d8ea_icon-check-technology-template.svg)
Control displayed fields
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/616eebc27888b7d03b09d8ea_icon-check-technology-template.svg)
Configure custom reporting lines
### "Names & Faces helps senior leaders better know their teams, it helps new employees get to know their coworkers and it cultivates a greater sense of employee engagement across the team." 
Leslie Quealy
VP of Global Human Resources at Bacharach
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/617bdc9a29e589f72a889d78_Screenshot%202021-08-27%20at%2011.41%202%20\(2\).png)
Integrations
## Multiple data sources
Contractors not in your HRIS system? No problem. Connect multiple sources of data to create a single directory and org chart for your team.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/616eebc27888b7d03b09d8ea_icon-check-technology-template.svg)
Daily HRIS Syncs keeps your data up to date
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/616eebc27888b7d03b09d8ea_icon-check-technology-template.svg)
Connect additional spreadsheet data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/616eebc27888b7d03b09d8ea_icon-check-technology-template.svg)
Collect info and photos with our built-in tools
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/6185069c618bf352b55fa6d7_Group%2063.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/6188dbcdb71f3c3ed8277d3d_gdpr-ready-badge-text.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/618ce0aef1d3972f850dc9c5_SOC_CPA_Blue.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/618ce0dfb724e84ffd73aeca_Psi_Logo_Horizontal-RGB.gif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/6188db2873ab791b21be6f83_barr.png)
Keeping your data safe
### World class security
Names & Faces is SOC 2 Certified and follows GDPR best practices. Our systems undergo regular audits and penetration tests to ensure we're meeting international security standards.
### An org chart for HR
Save 1000's of hours of manually creating and updating org charts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/6179459e5c05631c91c2b41a_CleanShot%202021-10-27%20at%2014.26.25%402x.png)[Explore org charts](http://www.namesandfaces.com/</orgchart>)
### A directory for leaders
Never be left guessing who someone is, what they look like or what they do.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616eebc27888b7685509d89d/617945be9e27020cee6d1726_CleanShot%202021-10-27%20at%2014.26.39%402x.png)[Explore directories](http://www.namesandfaces.com/</directory>)

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Names & Faces

**Mission:** Names & Faces aims to harness technology to create fast, visual indexes of people and organizations. The goal? To help everyone in an organization—from the CEO to new hires—get acquainted with who’s who, where they fit, and how to connect.

**Founding and Development:** Established in 2018, Names & Faces emerged from the Y Combinator Batch S18, gathering momentum with a clear focus on organizational clarity. This platform was initially conceived as a customizable visual index for employees within companies, enabling seamless access to information about colleagues.

**Location & Team:** Based in Palo Alto, California, the company operates with a tightly-knit team of 20 employees, all dedicated to enhancing workplace connectivity. Nan is noted as their Group Partner.

**Industry Focus:** Names & Faces serves various sectors, including Government, Financial Services, Retail, Healthcare, Hospitality, Manufacturing, and Non-Profits. This wide-ranging applicability showcases its versatility and utility across diverse business environments.

**Product Features:**
1. **Org Charts:** Visual representations allow users to see their organizational structure dynamically, without the headaches of traditional presentation software.
2. **Company Directory:** A comprehensive and customizable directory fosters connections among employees.
3. **Integrations:** Seamless connectivity with tools like ADP Workforce Now, Paylocity, Google Sheets, and more ensures that data remains up-to-date and accurate.
4. **User Experience:** The platform emphasizes a user-friendly approach, making it easy for team members to create directories and org charts within minutes.

**Value Proposition:** By transforming HR data into accessible, visual formats, Names & Faces significantly reduces the administrative burden associated with managing employee information. They've tapped into the innate human ability to recognize faces, fostering relationships and an improved sense of community within teams.

**Security:** Names & Faces is SOC 2 Certified, adhering to GDPR standards to ensure user data is protected and compliant with the latest international security protocols.

**Client Testimonials:** Users have noted that Names & Faces enhances understanding and engagement within teams. As an executive put it, "It helps senior leaders better know their teams, cultivates a greater sense of employee engagement across the team." 

**Getting Started:** Interested organizations can explore options to create custom directories and org charts through a demo or sign-up process available on their [website](http://www.namesandfaces.com).

In a world that thrives on connections, Names & Faces is making it easy to know who you're working with and how to reach them—quite literally putting faces to names.
